Ways to Keep Healthy in Spring ?B?

1. Doing Sports for Health Care

In spring, for adapting to the growth of Yang-qi, people need to enhance exercise and do some aerobic exercise in the outdoors and nature, which is helpful to exhale the old and inhale the new and stretch muscles and bones.

It is the first time for me to manage others, although the experience may provide me with some skills about managing

2. Prevention of Disease for Health care

In spring, respiratory disease and cardiovascular disease are more likely to outbreak, thus, people should pay more attention to the prevention and care of epidemic disease and communicable disease.

3. Drinking Tea for Health care

Traditional Chinese Medicine takes tea as the first-rank substance for life cultivation. Tea can replenish moisture in our body and advance metabolism; besides, tea contains microelement and compound that are beneficial to our health. One attraction is that scented tea is the optimum selection in spring.

Mild Reminder: Life cultivation in spring tends to conform to the characteristics of producing both in Yang-qi and all things on earth, and maintaining Yang-qi in particular.

TCM Life Cultivation Suggests Eight Don'ts after Meals (A)

1. Don't hurry to smoke.

The risk of smoking after meals is tenfold to that of the ordinary time. As the blood circulation amount in the digestive tracts increase after meals, substantial objectionable constituents in the cigarette are absorbed in the body which would damage the liver, brain and heart vessels.

2. Don't hurry to drink tea.

Substantial tannic acid contained in the tea would combine with the iron element and zinc element in the food to produce substance that is hard to be dissolved. Consequently, the iron element would lose. But if we drink tea one hour after meals, the situation mentioned above would not occur.

3. Don't hurry to take a shower.

If you take a shower after meals immediately, the blood would assemble in the body surface and the blood circulation amount in the gastrointestinal tracts would be less. As a result, the digestive function of the gastrointestinal tracts would decline.

Mild Reminder: Many people have formed lots of bad habits after meals, meanwhile those bad habits would probably do harm to health.

TCM Life Cultivation Suggests Eight Don'ts after Meals (B)

1. Don't hurry to go to bed.

Lying on the bed after meals would easily cause obesity disease. Medical specialists admonish that it is better to take 20 minutes rest before gonging to bed, even though it is a noontime snooze.

2. Don't hurry to take a walk.

The increase of the motion amount after meals will impact the digestion and intake of the nutritional substance. Especially for the elders, who have problems about the decline of the heart function, cardiovascular sclerosis or the functional disorders of reflex regulation for the blood pressure, would often suffer from blood pressure declining if taking walk after meals.

3. Don't hurry to drive.

As a matter of fact, accident can easily happen on those drivers who have just finished their meals. That's because the stomach and intestines need much blood to aid digestion, therefore, under such circumstance, transient ischemia of the brain organs can be caused easily, thus operation errors may occur.

Mild Reminder: Many people have formed lots of bad habits after meals, meanwhile those bad habits would probably do harm to health.

TCM Life Cultivation Suggests Eight Don'ts after Meals (C)

1. Don't hurry to eat fruits.

It will take about 1-2 hours for the meals to digest in the stomach before they are transferred to the small intestine. If we take in fruits just after meals, the foods will be blocked in the stomach and it will cause the disorder of the digestion function.

2. Don't hurry to loosen the trouser's belt.

Loosening belts after meals will release the abdominal pressure, and then it will weaken the supporting function of the digestive tracts and augment the burden of the digestive organs' mobility and ligament rapidly. Consequently, digestive systematic diseases like gastroptosis and upper abdominal discomfort etc would appear.

Mild Reminder: Many people have formed lots of bad habits after meals, meanwhile those bad habits would probably do harm to health.

Traditional Chinese Medicine Notices ?A?

1. The Best Time for Having bath
Before sleeping at night, having a warm bath make systemic muscle and joint flabby and accelerate blood circulation, so it is helpful to have a deep sleep.

2. The Best Time for Losing WeightIt
It is best time to lose weight 45 minutes after meals and having a walk up to 1,600m in 20 minutes is regarded as the most helpful to lose weight, while it is more effective if doing exercise for 2 hours, together with having a walk for 20 minutes.

3. The Best Time for Eating Fruits
Having fruits one hour before meals is most beneficial to health as fruits are foods that can be eaten rawly. And the white cells in the body would not increase if people eat raw foods before cooked foods, which is helpful for protecting the immune system and strengthening the ability to prevent diseases. But this kind of protection would not occur by eating fruits after meals. Besides, the fructose contained in fruits can not be absorbed by the intestines when people eat fruits after meals, thus, it would ferment in the stomach, causing uncomfortable feelings such as abdominal distension and diarrhea, etc. Therefore, it is better to eat fruits about one hour after meals.

Mild Reminder: Traditional Chinese Medicine provides us with these important notices, if you want to be healthier, please follow them.

Traditional Chinese Medicine Notices ?B?

1. The Best Time for Drinking Water
The best time for drinking water is after getting up in the morning. Drinking a cup of water with an empty stomach in the morning can supply the moisture consumed in the night. It is quite good for preventing diseases such as high blood pressure and cerebral thrombosis.

2. The Best Time for Taking Exercise
It is best to take exercise in the evening. The reason is that all human activities are influenced by biological clock, no matter the adjusting ability or the playing of physical strength, afternoon and evening are the best times for those activities. But it is converse in the morning when blood pressure and heart rate are obviously higher than that in the evening, which may pose threat to people's health.

3. The Best Time for Going to Bed
The best time for noontime snooze is one hour after lunch as the body is dull at that time and it is easy for people to fall asleep. Meanwhile, the period between 10-11pm is the best time for sleeping in the evening because deep sleep often occur between 12 pm at the midnight and 3 am in the morning and it often take about one and half hour for people to fall into deep sleep. As for the sleeping hours, it's best to get eight to nine hours of sleep everyday.

Mild Reminder: Traditional Chinese Medicine provides us with these important notices, if you want to be healthier, please follow them.

Life Cultivation----Different in the Morning and Evening

1. Morning regimen focuses on “practice”

We should form a good habit of relieving the bowels in early morning, and then open the window in order to discharge the internal dirty air and bring in the fresh air. After that, don't forget to drink a glass of water and eat a little staple food before doing exercise.

2. Focusing on “having a rest” at noon

No matter how busy we are, we should take a break for a while like a nap. Noontime snooze is good for improving our brain efficiency, enhancing concentration, reducing fatigue and increasing working efficiency in the afternoon. An effective nap should lasts for about 15 to 30 minutes and be taken 20 minutes after lunch. It is better to wash face with cool water to make us clear-headed.

Mild Reminder: Getting up around six o'clock is good for our health.

Ten Parent-Child Games can Improve Child’s Memory(A)

1. Animal games
Purpose: develop memory
Play:Mother gets the animal toys together and numbers each animal toy. In the beginning, mother puts each toy stand in its number and please lets baby remember. Then mother picks up the number and mess the number. Then mother lets the baby label original number to each toy and see whether the baby can exactly put number to the toy correspondence or not.

2. Name one by one
Purpose:cultivate short-term memory
Play: Parent puts some goods (more than five kinds) on the table in sequence. The baby remembers them in 30 seconds. Then parent ask the baby to say the name of these goods in sequence from memory by sheltering these goods.

3. Memorize by watching the picture
Purpose: teach sorting memorial method
Material:Animals on the pictures or cards
Play:Let the baby see a picture draw several kinds of animals in a limited time. You can give him enough time to see at first. Then shorten the time gradually. Then you ask the baby what animals in the picture after take away the picture.

4. Make a phone
Purpose:Cultivate memory and imagination, enrich vocabulary and promote the development of language ability
Play:Sit with the baby in the same direction. Mum stretch out her thumb and little finger to ear to imitate make a phone, asking to the baby:” hey, who are you?”, “where do you live?” and etc.

Mild Reminder: Parents tell continuous fairy tale to baby and let him remember where to stop everyday.

Ten Parent-Child Games can Improve Child’s Memory(B)

1. Look into the window case
Purpose:develop observation and the accuracy of his memory
Play: This game suitable for going out with your baby. When passing the shop window, you should let the baby observe the good in the display window carefully. Then you ask the baby what he saw in the window after leaving. Similarly, you let the baby observe the flower beds and say how many several color of flowers.

2. Memory words
Purpose: Enlarge the breadth of short-term memory
Play: Let the baby repeated the story which told him before and see how many words he can remember. Let the baby say some word he familiar, such as transportation, animal and plant words and other words.

3. Answer questions after listening stories
Purpose: Cultivate intentionally attention and memory
Play: When reading stories to the baby, you require your baby listen carefully and then answer questions according to the stories. For example, you read the story of The little horse and the river and ask him:” who say the water is very shallow?”, “who say it was deep?” etc.

4 Recall names
Purpose: develop name’s memory
Play: When watching TV or reading with the baby, you could require him to remember the names in the story and then let the baby memorize everyone’s name.

Mild reminder: Parents tell continuous fairy tale to baby and let him remember where to stop everyday.

The Revelation of Chinese Style Divorce,health ,traditional

Revelation 1: Misunderstanding is normal in marriage

Analysis from character, we can see that Lin Xiaofeng is a woman who shows her warm or cold attitude toward other completely depending on her current mood. Lin Xiaofeng dissatisfies with a lack of love from Song Jianping. Lin Xiaofeng is a woman who needs constantly sharing with her husband and needs to know everything so as to gain a sense of security.

However, Song Jianping is a man who doesn’t like to expose his heart and communicate with others actively. So, their marriage is difficult to calm down after they married. In this marriage, it is either the woman become more and more hysteric or the man become depressive increasingly.

Revelation 2: Song style of men is highly lethal for women

Song style of men attracts women around by using the ways of hide the elegance in the depression and the grievance and of the unprincipled tolerance of his wife. Xiao Li and Juanzi are attracted by Song Jianping because of sympathy. Ultimately, both of these two women involve in his marital conflict, suffering from insult from his wife Lin Xiaofeng.

Actor Chen Daoming interprets the role of Song Jianping vividly. In this film, he has two sides of personality which include caring others in front of the outsiders and keeping alone, tolerating to refuse, retreating to indifferent, defending to attack in his marriage.

Revelation 3: People lack of communication instead of trust in marriage

Lacking of communication is Song Jianping’s fault, while lacking of trust is Lin Xiaofeng’s fault. Whose fault is more serious? Think it over, in the marriage lacking of communication, lacking of care and sharing, it’s common that a person makes trouble to force both sides to force both sides to communicate and share. Of course, what they share may be the sadness. But sharing sadness is much better than share nothing because at least it looks like a marriage.

Mild Reminder: If the couple couldn’t reach proper communication with each other in marriage, they will misunderstand with each other and smoke signals must rise on all sides in this marriage.

Revelation 1: It’s men’s stratagem to make woman hysterical

In Song Jianping’s heart, he wants to let his wife make some trouble so he can escape from the responsibilities of marriage. Many men like to play victims of the marriage in front of people. Thus, he not only can receive sympathy of others, but also can escape from the conviction of marriage violations. Gradually, the woman herself destroys her confidence and dignity by her own actions and accomplishes the man’s attempt foolishly.

Many men, like Song Jianping, need more self-space in marriage. His self-boundary is so strong that it’s difficult for his wife to get into his heart. This mental state can be understood as self-esteem or defense. Psychological defense likes a mask. In order to protect the mask integrally, people lose the diversity, flexibility and elasticity of their personality. The reasons why men are not willing to be honest lie in hat they are more likely to lack of security and confidence in women.

Mild Reminder: Some men who want to divorce but care about face. Those men do some unthinking things, speak some ambiguous words, and even intentionally play with the other women outside.

How Effective is the Sunscreen You Use? (I)

Some readers complained about suffer from acnes after applying the sunscreen to their skins. What’s the reason and how to solve it?

Shanshan from Kanebo thinks that applying the sunscreen is one of main reasons for acnes.

LANCASTER in Professor Z makes clear that although the high SPF can protect us from the sun for a long period of time, it also can lead to poor permeability and high greasy degrees. So, do remember to discharge the makeup completely so as to prevent the problem of pores block in the skin.

How to measure SPF and PA in the sunscreen? Is there a international uniform standard? How to choose a sunscreen successfully?

Shanshan from Kanebo points out that though SPF is tested by each brand themselves, ultimately it must be tested through health inspection. So, the consumers can choose to the sunscreen marked by special purpose.

Mid Reminder: If you don’t clean your skin completely after applying the sunscreen, you may suffer from acnes.

How Effective is the Sunscreen You Use? (II)

Tony Vargas Elizabeth Arden of Global R & D Director points out that all of the sunscreen must be tested by FDA before puting into the market in America. Other countries also have their own national determination institutions.

Many customers have the misunderstanding that the higher the SPF , the better. But LANCASTER in Professor Z suggests that it’s meaningless to choose the SPF that is over 30 because SPF 30 already can resist 98% of the UVB.

What’s the different between sun cream and sun screen which contains SPF? Which is more suited to the Office Lady (OL)?

Mild Reminder: The higher the SPF needs more chemical compositions which are much more damage to the skin.

Private Shape Beauty Bottoms (I)

Fitness ball exercises: training the bottom, thigh line and pulling the abdomen in and back muscle.

Action one: put the ball on a wall and place it on the waist holding by the body. Both hands akimbo and both feet placed on the front of the body. Toes outward slightly and look at the front horizontally.

Action two: Squat knees and keep in a state of uniform constant motion. When the thigh is parallel to the ground, pause for one to two seconds, stand up in constant speed. When squatting, the knee position shouldn’t over the position of toes.

Private Coach suggests: when do exercise with fitness ball, you should use your legs to stabilize your body by putting force. Action can stimulate the leg muscles fibers to release energy and drive heart rate. With the increase of heart rate, calorie burns rapidly, thereby accelerating the consumption of fat.

Mild Reminder: Latin athletic expert Andre Bowman tells us that a set of effective exercise of hip line can quickly create the beauty hip line that you desire to.

Private Shape Beauty Bottoms (II)

Squat like arrow: training the quadriceps, biceps femoris and gluteus maximus.

Action one: take the dumbbell in each hand, holding the body straight, step forward.

Action two: Squat knees. The front knee should not over toes, because if it over toes, the more pressure will put into the knee and low the body’s stability. The back knee shouldn’t fall to the ground. Raise your hand and look at the front horizontally. Repeat alternating legs around three to four groups, fifteen to twenty for a group.

Be extended after doing exercises.

Beginners: practice twice a week. Take a rest at least one day after each exercise. Take a one minute rest between every group of exercise. The primary exerciser tries to enter next exercise after doing exercise at least four weeks.

Experienced exercisers: try to train in three groups of mix exercises. After doing one group of gluteus maximus exercise, then doing a fitness ball exercise, and then doing exercise of squat like arrow. Don’t take rest during these three groups of exercises. After doing them in turn, then repeat for a second time and then for a third time. You can rest for one minute between every repeat.

Mild Reminder: Latin athletic expert Andre Bowman tells us that a set of effective exercise of hip line can quickly create the beauty hip line that you desire to.

How to Make Medicinal Liquor? (I)

Commonly used medicinal materials are ginseng, snake, Chinese wolfberry, pilose antler, aweto, American ginseng, etc. The curative effects are different according to liquors. When making medicinal liquors, people should choose liquors of different degrees and flavors according their likes and dislikes.

Medicinal materials used for medicinal liquor can be a whole one or chopped into pieces or parts of 3-5mm length and are seldom grinded into particles as particles could make the liquor turbid easily and their transmissivity is not so good. Besides, Particles dissolve easily and their consistence is quite high. So, large particles are used only when quick dissolved medicinal materials are needed.

Mild Reminder: Sorted by the natures of medicines included, medicinal liquors are sorted into medicinal liquor of animals, medicinal liquor of herbs, medicinal liquor of animasl and herbs and medicinal of minerals.

How to Make Medicinal Liquor? (II)

Glass bottles with polished mouths are often selected as containers for holding medicinal liquors because they are airtight and can prevent medicinal materials from oxidation. It is better to choose bottles with dark colors. If transparent bottles are used, they should avoid sunlight. Also, there is requirement for the proportion of liquor and medicinal materials.

Generally speaking, the medicinal materials soaked take up 1/3 of the whole medicinal liquor.

The medicinal liquors should keep indoor with normal temperature, be airtight and avoid sunlight. Shaking the bottles several times per day is called cold-maceration method which is the most commonly used method. And there is another method called hot-cooking in which medicinal materials are cooked with liquor.

Mild Reminder: It is quite easy for liquor to volatilize and the consistence can be reduced by this method and the medicinal liquor can not be kept for long.
